text: Why do some ws want to know ur car plate when book appointment in WhatsApp?

Only if U send for PPI
That time I send for PPI  they didnâ€™t mention if itâ€™s is or not. Like never check or mention.

I claim him alr. Waiting for him to file.
Ws mechanics many times give me wrong diagnosis.
My car vibrate at low speed. They saw the driveshaft is abit shaky. Told me to change driveshaft.
Ok so whatâ€™s the right diagnosis?
I ownself research n find out rear tyre diameter 3% larger
Whut?! Then after changing the tyre the problem resolve?
Stupid ws with tattoo msian mechanics
Told me he had 20 yrs experience repair cars
When doing repair in his ws  he lifted my car up for 2 days. Then the coolant keep dripping on my turbo hose connection with intercooler. Stupid mechanic didnâ€™t use a cloth to cover connection

Which ws is that? Pm me
But my car just gonna be repaired by patch work. V unfair Sia. Then the padestrian just Scott free who created this mess
When I go highway  the whole turbo hose burst thx to the mechanic
I ask the mechanic to add only water into the coolant reservoir bcos I want to observe. He add water n do coolant bleeding. I ask him he bleed gum lan?
He say itâ€™s necessary n want to charge me for bleeding
Then I tell him but Lim pei never tell u bleed leh

This is just 1 encounter. Usually The ws mechanics r clueless abt ur car n will not research ur car in detail to find out exact problem. They will only guess. U pay for their guess. N when repairing  they will not treat other car components carefully like preventing coolant from dripping on to other components
Waaaah so many stories leh you
The stupid mechanic see coolant drip on to the turbo hose do nothing. Let it drip for 2 days 2 nights
Because you donâ€™t want let him repair and he needs to earn money. So probably heâ€¦..

Then when heâ€™s installing back the driveshaft  he shove the driveshaft in such a way that it punctured this
Extremely negligent  rough n stupid msian mechanic giving me all wrong diagnosis n damaged my turbo n control arm n did things I didnâ€™t ask him to
If mechanic damaged ur control arm like this  can ask him pay?
If you got proof then no harm to  try
Pedestrians got no incentive to cross roads properly. Alot of them willing to gamble their lives away
When do anything in ws  better be there at all times n scrutinise everything the mechanics do n video
bro if ur buyer is an experienced or has frens in the industry  one look they will know one
